item.title: TCPing
item.description: tcping.exe is a small console application that operates similarly to ‘ping’, however it works over a tcp port. License: GPL -Â Platforms: Win XP, Vista 7 When I have to test if a TCP connection works, like when configuring a NAT or ACL rule, usually I telnet the specific port. TCPing allows to keep the “ping” active on the port to check when the rule works:
